iiv.display

Interface ShowPointImage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CNUStdImgFile, DisplayBox, DisplayColorMap, DisplayColorMapQuilt, DisplayComponent, DisplayDraw, DisplayLine, DisplayOval, DisplayShape, DisplayText, IntensityProjectionImage, ScriptableDisplayComponent, ShowPointDisplayLine, SingleImg

    public interface ShowPointImage
    ShowPointImage defines methods for a component to display voxel values.
    Since:
    iiV1.1
    See Also:
    ShowPointDisplay, DisplayComponent

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FIXED_CROSSHAIR 
      static int NO_CROSSHAIR 
      static int TRACKING_CROSSHAIR 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawTrackingCrosshair(int[] indices, Color crosshairColor)
      Erases the old tracking crosshair a draws a new one on this component with exclusive-or for fast drawing an erasing.
      Color getCrosshairColor()
      Gets the currently displayed crosshair color
      int[] getCrosshairIndices()
      Gets a copy of the currently displayed crosshair indices.
      int[] getIndices(Point pt)
      Gets the indices corresponding to the original raw data this display component is created from based on a point relative to the component.
      Point getPoint(int[] indices)
      Gets the point relative to the component given the indices corresponding to the original raw data this display component is created from.
      void setCrosshair(int[] indices, Color crosshairColor)
      Erases the old crosshair a draws a new one on this component.
      void showPoint(int[] indices, ShowPointDisplay spd)
      Displays the value of the data associated with this component at the given indice in the given show point display.

    • Method Detail

      • showPoint

        void showPoint(int[] indices,
               ShowPointDisplay spd)
        Displays the value of the data associated with this component at the given indice in the given show point display.
        Parameters:
        indices - the indices into the data
        spd - the display to show the point data in

      • getIndices

        int[] getIndices(Point pt)
        Gets the indices corresponding to the original raw data this display component is created from based on a point relative to the component.
        Parameters:
        pt - point location relative to component
        Returns:
        indices indices to original raw data which may have any number of dimensions or null if invalid point

      • getPoint

        Point getPoint(int[] indices)
        Gets the point relative to the component given the indices corresponding to the original raw data this display component is created from.
        Parameters:
        indices - indices to original raw data which may have any number of dimensions
        Returns:
        location relative to the component. Indices that map off the image are forced onto the image.

      • setCrosshair

        void setCrosshair(int[] indices,
                  Color crosshairColor)
        Erases the old crosshair a draws a new one on this component.
        Parameters:
        indices - indices the crosshair points to
        crosshairColor - color of crosshair

      • getCrosshairIndices

        int[] getCrosshairIndices()
        Gets a copy of the currently displayed crosshair indices.
        Returns:
        indices to currently displayed crosshair

      • getCrosshairColor

        Color getCrosshairColor()
        Gets the currently displayed crosshair color
        Returns:
        color of currently displayed crosshair

      • drawTrackingCrosshair

        void drawTrackingCrosshair(int[] indices,
                           Color crosshairColor)
        Erases the old tracking crosshair a draws a new one on this component with exclusive-or for fast drawing an erasing.
        Parameters:
        indices - indices the crosshair points to
        crosshairColor - color of crosshair
